title: Marshmallow Scoop
description: See who can scoop the most marshmallows into a bowl using only a spoon in their mouth
instructions: Place marshmallows in one bowl. Hold spoon in mouth (no hands!). Transfer as many marshmallows as possible to the empty bowl within the time limit.

title: Cookie Face Challenge
description: Move a cookie from your forehead to your mouth using only facial muscles
instructions: Place cookie on forehead. Tilt head back slightly. Use only facial muscles to move cookie to mouth. No hands allowed!

title: Penny Tower
description: Stack as many pennies as possible in 60 seconds
instructions: Stack pennies on top of each other. The person with the tallest stable tower when time runs out wins.

title: Paper Airplane Contest
description: Design and fly the paper airplane that travels the farthest
instructions: Each player gets one sheet of paper. Design your airplane. Take turns flying from the same starting line. Measure distances.

title: Blind Taste Test
instructions: One player is blindfolded. Others prepare 5 different foods. Blindfolded player tastes and guesses each item. Most correct guesses wins.

title: Sock Basketball
description: Shoot rolled-up socks into a laundry basket from different distances
instructions: Roll socks into balls. Set basket 6 feet away. Each player gets 10 shots. Move basket further for bonus points.

title: Memory Palace
description: Memorize and recall a sequence of household items
instructions: Arrange 15 items in a line. Players study for 30 seconds, then items are covered. Write down items in correct order.

title: Charades Relay
description: Act out movie titles, books, or phrases for your team to guess
instructions: Write phrases on paper. Teams take turns. One person acts, team guesses. No talking or sounds allowed. Most correct guesses wins.

title: Christmas Cookie Decorating
description: Decorate cookies with festive designs and vote for the best
instructions: Each player decorates 2 cookies. Focus on Christmas themes. Everyone votes for categories: Most Creative, Most Festive, Most Delicious Looking.

title: Spooky Story Building
description: Create a scary story together, one sentence at a time
instructions: Sit in a circle. First person writes opening sentence. Fold paper to hide previous sentences, leaving only the last one visible. Continue until story is complete.

title: Rubber Band Shooting Gallery
description: Knock down plastic cups with rubber bands
instructions: Set up pyramid of cups on table. Stand 8 feet away. Each player gets 10 rubber bands. Most cups knocked down wins.

title: Smoothie Creation Challenge
description: Create the most delicious smoothie with random ingredients
instructions: Each player randomly selects 4 ingredients. Create a smoothie. Everyone tastes all smoothies and votes for the winner.

title: Human Knot
description: Work together to untangle yourselves without letting go of hands
instructions: Stand in circle. Everyone reaches across and grabs two different people's hands. Work together to untangle into a circle without letting go.

title: Birthday Wish Guessing
description: Guess what the birthday person's three wishes would be
instructions: Birthday person secretly writes 3 wishes. Others write their guesses. Reveal wishes one by one. Points for correct or close guesses.

title: Puzzle Race
description: Complete identical jigsaw puzzles to see who finishes first
instructions: Give each player/team an identical puzzle. Start simultaneously. First to complete their puzzle wins.
